about_the_game:
It's a long way to the summit..

"Summit Hopper" is a precision platforming journey where every hop must be executed with precise timing and pinpoint accuracy. Navigate through intricately designed dynamic environments, each with unique modifiers requiring constant strategic adjustment.

Gameplay

Punishing platforming.
The higher you ascend, the harder you fall. Time your jumps carefully as the power in a jump not only changes how high you reach but also the angle you launch at. Although this can be difficult to learn, it can be mastered.

Adapt your approach
Different obstacles will require new tactics. Only mastering precise jumping will not bring you to success. Environmental modifiers will also force a change in pace multiple times throughout your journey.

Physics
Interactions with realistic physics at some points as a static environment would be too kind.

Ambience

Unique Environments
Many different environments and interactive effects with distinct atmosphere and audio throughout. A diverse world that you explore as you ascend.

Calm and Rage
Peaceful moods with calming tunes just in case you get stuck for awhile. On the other hand, sometimes you are taunted when you fall..

A Different Ending..

A special conclusion for those who reach the summit. Many games in this genre feature an underwhelming finale. A substantial effort was made to detach from this status quo.

Addendum
A special thanks to the authors that allowed the referencing of their game.
